name: WidgetTemplateBuilder
description: Builder class for creating WidgetControlTemplate objects. Provides a fluent API for step-by-step configuration of widget templates.
rawdescription:
Builder class for creating WidgetControlTemplate objects.
Provides a fluent API for step-by-step configuration of widget templates.

methods.rawdescription: Add option for the widget template..
